title: fifty3dragons animation hub (updated December 2024)
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

Welcome to my animation hub!

**SCP ROOKIES**

SCP Rookies is an animated sketch comedy about a group of clone recruits who work at the SCP Foundation, causing havoc and mayhem on the job.

Compilations for the first two series are available below. Individual episodes follow.

[NOTE: Because these are short comedy sketches, individual episodes and compilations can be watched in any order]

**The Complete Red Series**

[[embedvideo]]
<iframe width="787" height="443" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/hNRMR4Wh6R8" title="SCP Rookies - The Complete Red Series" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
[[/embedvideo]]

**The Complete Green Series**

[[embedvideo]] 
<iframe width="804" height="452" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Va4a6E101eM" title="SCP Rookies - The Complete Green Series" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
[[/embedvideo]]

[[tabview]]

[[tab SCP Rookies - The Green Series]]

[[collapsible show="+ S1E1 - There Will Be Death (SCP-844)" hide="- Close"]]

**Series 1 Episode 1 - There Will Be Death**

On his first day working at the SCP Foundation, a new clone recruit learns the ropes from a veteran.

Inspired by [*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-844 SCP-844 (Crybaby)].

[[embedvideo]]
<iframe width="787" height="443" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/hDy0Gw1l_G0" title="Crybaby | SCP-844 | Rookies (E1)" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" allowfullscreen></iframe>
[[/embedvideo]]

[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ S1E2 - The Fountain of Too Much Youth (SCP-006)" hide="- Close"]]

**Series 1 Episode 2 - The Fountain of Too Much Youth**

While on his coffee break, a clone recruit discovers the perils of the so-called Fountain of Youth.

Inspired by [*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-006 SCP-006 (Fountain of Youth) by Unknown Author and rewritten by Epic Phail Spy and Proxtown].

[[embedvideo]]
<iframe width="787" height="443" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/IWHmF_tJ5PY" title="Fountain of Youth | SCP-006 | Rookies (E2)" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" allowfullscreen></iframe>
[[/embedvideo]]

[[/collapsible]]


[[collapsible show="+ S1E3 - How NOT to Survive a Zombie Attack (SCP-008)" hide="- Close"]]

**Series 1 Episode 3 - How NOT to Survive a Zombie Attack**

While fighting off a zombie horde, two clone recruits must make a terrible decision when the unthinkable happens.

Inspired by [*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-008 SCP-008 (Zombie Plague) by Unknown Author].

[[embedvideo]]
<iframe width="787" height="443" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/gcWjpXuc3Fk" title="Zombie Plague | SCP-008 | Rookies (E3)" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" allowfullscreen></iframe>
[[/embedvideo]]

[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ S1E4 - Don't Annoy the Tickle Monster (SCP-999)" hide="- Close"]]

**Series 1 Episode 4 - Don't Annoy the Tickle Monster**

The Tickle Monster runs out of candy. Chaos ensues.

Inspired by [*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-999 SCP-999 (The Tickle Monster) by ProfSnider].

[[embedvideo]]
<iframe width="787" height="443" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/YfCfZVTdEMc" title="The Tickle Monster | SCP-999 | Rookies (E4)" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" allowfullscreen></iframe>
[[/embedvideo]]

[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ S1E5 - Invasion of the Black Tentacles (SCP-5007)" hide="- Close"]]

**Series 1 Episode 5 - Invasion of the Black Tentacles**

A clone recruit visits the on-site doctor to get advice about a distressing medical issue.

Inspired by [*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-5007 SCP-5007 (Bass Strait) by Dr Balthazaar].

[[embedvideo]]
<iframe width="787" height="443" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/kPfaoA1m2B4" title="Black Tentacles | SCP-5007 | Rookies (E5)" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" allowfullscreen></iframe>
[[/embedvideo]]

[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ S1E6 - Don’t Play with Fire Snakes (SCP-3102)" hide="- Close"]]

**Series 1 Episode 6 - Don’t Play with Fire Snakes**

A clone recruit assists a senior researcher with a little experiment, but not everything goes to plan.

Inspired by [*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-3102 SCP-3102 (The Conflagration) by megalan] and [*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-5731 SCP-5731 (Dolittle's Music Box) by A Green Squid Kid].

[[embedvideo]]
<iframe width="787" height="443" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/KE86ZtrRsFU" title="Don’t Play with Fire Snakes | SCP | Rookies" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" allowfullscreen></iframe>
[[/embedvideo]]

[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ S1E7 -Seven Hundred Million Wizards Must Die (SCP-8320)" hide="- Close"]]

**Series 1 Episode 7 - Seven Hundred Million Wizards Must Die**

After a long day of shooting wizards, the clone recruits head to the break room for some hard-earned snacks. Things do not go according to plan.

Inspired by [*https://scpwiki.com/scp-8320 SCP-8320 (Seven Hundred Million Wizards) by Raddagher].

SIDE NOTE: SCP-8320 was one of my very favourite entries from the 8K Contest. In addition to being a well written article, it contains some outstanding voice-over work in the form of several accompanying audio recordings. Well worth checking out if you haven't already!

[[embedvideo]]
<iframe width="787" height="443" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/w6YeN13valM" title="Wizard Cat Donut Gun | SCP | Rookies" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
[[/embedvideo]]

[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ S1E8 - Rope Climbing Gone Horribly Wrong (SCP-144)" hide="- Close"]]

**Series 1 Episode 8 - Rope Climbing Gone Horribly Wrong**

While conducting tests on a rope in Tibet that extends into the sky, the clone recruits learn the meaning of "what goes up, must come down."

Inspired by [*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-144 SCP-144 (Tibetan Rope to Heaven) by FritzWillie].

[[embedvideo]]
<iframe width="787" height="443" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/maJ4dox8_Ww" title="Family Rope Climbing Trip Gone Wrong | SCP-144 | Rookies" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
[[/embedvideo]]

[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ S1E9 - There IS an Antimemetics Division" hide="- Close"]]

**Series 1 Episode 9 - There IS an Antimemetics Division**

Contrary to popular belief, it turns out there IS an Antimemetics Division at the SCP Foundation. Or is there?

Inspired by [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/antimemetics-division-hub “There is No Antimemetics Division” by qntm.]

[[embedvideo]]
<iframe width="787" height="443" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/97y-qAujeT8" title="There IS an Antimemetics Division | SCP Tales | Rookies" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
[[/embedvideo]]

[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ S1E10 - Deus Ex Machina (SCP-2000)" hide="- Close"]]

**Series 1 Episode 10 - Deus Ex Machina**

Finally, the origins of the clone recruits is revealed!

Inspired by [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-2000 SCP-2000 (Deus Ex Machina) by HammerMaiden].

[[embedvideo]]
<iframe width="787" height="443" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/gRAIi40bbL8" title="" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
[[/embedvideo]]

[[/collapsible]]

[[/tab]]

[[tab SCP Rookies - The Red Series]]

[[collapsible show="+ S2E1 - Beware the Boogeyman (SCP-015-IT)" hide="- Close"]]

**Episode 1 - Beware the Boogeyman**

When a containment breach catches him less than prepared, newly promoted Senior Agent Indigo must improvise.

Inspired by [*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-015-it SCP-015-IT (The Boogeyman)].

[[embedvideo]]
<iframe width="787" height="443" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/kq1txnDqO-g?list=PL8deFf33LdsI_X55deSGcQjtmDXY7nh40" title="Beware the Boogeyman | SCP-015-IT | Rookies" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
[[/embedvideo]]

[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ S2E2 - Top Way to LOSE Your Security Clearance (SCP-131)" hide="- Close"]]

**Episode 2 - Top Way to LOSE Your Security Clearance ()**

After a successful containment mission, two clones must decide on a course of action when the existence of the Foundation gets revealed.

Inspired by [*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-131 SCP-131 (The "Eye Pods") by Lt Masipag].

[[embedvideo]]
<iframe width="787" height="443" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/W4WLUF-F0NA?list=PL8deFf33LdsI_X55deSGcQjtmDXY7nh40" title="Top Way to LOSE Your Security Clearance | SCP | Rookies" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
[[/embedvideo]]

[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ S2E3 - Enjoy Judgmental Turtle (SCP-698)" hide="- Close"]]

**Episode  - Enjoy Judgmental Turtle (SCP-698)**

A clone recruit uses Judgmental Turtle to help him make a critical choice.

Inspired by [*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-698 SCP-698 (Judgmental Turtle) by DrHawkwind and Voct].

[[embedvideo]]
<iframe width="787" height="443" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/1jbzxnUYOtY?list=PL8deFf33LdsI_X55deSGcQjtmDXY7nh40" title="Enjoy Judgmental Turtle | SCP-698 | Rookies" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
[[/embedvideo]]

[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ S2E4 - Hunting Bigfoot (SCP-1000)" hide="- Close"]]

**Episode 4 - Hunting Bigfoot (SCP-1000)**

Somewhere deep in the forest of the Pacific Northwest, several MTF teams from the SCP Foundation compete to capture Bigfoot.

Inspired by [*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-1000 SCP-1000 (Bigfoot) by thedeadlymoose]

[[embedvideo]]
<iframe width="787" height="443" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Ru7NOMNnkVQ?list=PL8deFf33LdsI_X55deSGcQjtmDXY7nh40" title="Hunting Bigfoot | SCP-1000 | Rookies" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
[[/embedvideo]]

[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ S2E5 - Mr. Fish versus Severed Hand (SCP-527)" hide="- Close"]]

**Series 2 Episode 5 - Mr. Fish versus Severed Hand (SCP-527)**

Mr. Fish (SCP-527) attempts to conduct an examination of a severed hand with the help of a clone recruit. It does not end well.

Inspired by [*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6179 SCP-6179 (Hand Attack) by OCuin]

[[embedvideo]]
<iframe width="787" height="443" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/w8mXnDjZ8Qw?list=PL8deFf33LdsI_X55deSGcQjtmDXY7nh40" title="Mr. Fish versus Severed Hand | SCP-527 and SCP-6179 | Rookies" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
[[/embedvideo]]

[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ S2E6 - The Plague Doctor Takes a Temp Job (SCP-049)" hide="- Close"]]

**Series 2 Episode 6 - The Plague Doctor Takes a Temp Job (SCP-049)**

The Plague Doctor (SCP-049) arrives at a Foundation facility to rid it of any pestilence, only to get more than he bargained for.

Inspired by [*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-049 SCP-049 (The Plague Doctor) by Gabriel Jade, rewritten by djkaktus & Gabriel Jade].

[[embedvideo]]
<iframe width="787" height="443" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Vqh0CZay7hk?list=PL8deFf33LdsI_X55deSGcQjtmDXY7nh40" title="The Plague Doctor Takes a Temp Job | SCP-049 | Rookies" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
[[/embedvideo]]

[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ S2E7 - This Rock Wants to Kill You (SCP-283)" hide="- Close"]]

**Series 2 Episode 7 - This Rock Wants to Kill You (SCP-283)**

Look out! They're trying to steal all the donuts!! Also, SCP-283 has breached containment.

Inspired by [*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-283 SCP-283 (A Rock That Falls Sideways) by Dr Oliver Wood].

[[embedvideo]]
<iframe width="787" height="443" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/nNMXl4aP8b8?list=PL8deFf33LdsI_X55deSGcQjtmDXY7nh40" title="This Rock Wants to Kill You | SCP-283 | Rookies" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
[[/embedvideo]]

[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ S2E8 - Sharks are Super Awful (SPC)" hide="- Close"]]

**Series 2 Episode 8 - Sharks are Super Awful (SPC)**

A recruitment song for the Shark Punching Center. Get ready to punch some sharks!!

Inspired by [*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/spc-hub the articles and tales about the Shark Punching Center (SPC)].

[[embedvideo]]
<iframe width="787" height="443" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/BkO3d-d3ZSQ?list=PL8deFf33LdsI_X55deSGcQjtmDXY7nh40" title="Sharks are Super Awful (Original Song) | SPC/SCP | Rookies" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
[[/embedvideo]]

[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="+ S2E9 - The WRONG Way to Cybernetically Enhance Your Body (SCP-2806)" hide="- Close"]]

**Series 2 Episode 9 - The WRONG Way to Cybernetically Enhance Your Body (SCP-2806)**

Agent Ash, one of the clone recruits, receives an upgrade from the site doctor during his physical.

Inspired by [*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-2806 SCP-2806 (We Have the Technology) by Jacob Conwell]

[[embedvideo]]
<iframe width="787" height="443" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/P8ili60bfuc" title="The WRONG Way to Cybernetically Enhance Your Body | SCP-2806 | Rookies" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture; web-share" referrerpolicy="strict-origin-when-cross-origin" allowfullscreen></iframe>
[[/embedvideo]]

[[/collapsible]]
